=== About Me ===
==== Summary ====
Well basically i am interested in linux, computers, basketball and table tennis. Linux user since late 2006 (Ubuntu). I am currently in studying Electronic Engineering at University.
==== Short Facts ====

'''Age:''' 17

'''D.O.B:''' 23 July 1990

'''location:''' Australia

=== Linux ===

=== My contributions ===

==== Short Summary ====
I am active in the Ubuntu Community, in helping to grow and educate the new user base. I am active in the Ubuntu Forums, as leader of the Unanswered Posts Team and member of the Beginners Area Team. I am active in IRC, also as IRC focus group co-leader of the Beginners Area Team. I am a mentor of the Ubuntu New User Network. Wherever possible, i also promote Ubuntu at my school.

==== Ubuntu Forums ====
I am active on the UbuntuForums (over 1000 posts)

 {*} I am leader of the UbuntuForums UnansweredPostsTeam (a team to answer threads with 0 replies)

 {*} Member of the UbuntuForums <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Beginners/Team|BeginnersTeam]]</nowiki> (a team to help new users to ubuntu.) I am also the IRC Focus Group co-leader with <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Joeb454|Joe Barker]]</nowiki>

You may also like to see my two tutorials on the Ubuntu Forums. They contain some handy information for users new and old to ubuntu:
 {*} <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=842307|HowTO Ubuntu System (Tutorial of the week, in week 1 of August 2008)]]</nowiki>

 {*} <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=880664|HOWTO Ubuntu Networking]]</nowiki>

==== IRC ====
I offer help to all users in need of it, (new and old). Mostly this is in #ubuntu and ##beginners-help, but other channels will see me in there from time to time also.

==== Testimonials ====

I have worked with Andrew many times, whether it's on with the Unanswered Posts or Beginners Team. He has been a lot of help to me in the past, and I enjoy running the Beginners Team IRC group with him (bhb is an awesome bot...). I whole-heartedly support his application to become an Ubuntu Member.

-- <nowiki>[[Joeb454|Joe Barker]]</nowiki>

Andrew is amazing at the forums, on the IRC, everywhere. I have worked with him since some time now and he has an amazingly positive attitude towards all members. He is a great team leader (the Unanswered Posts Team) and evidently, a dedicated individual. He has my full support for the membership

-- <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu.com/SayakBanerjee|Sayak Banerjee]]</nowiki>

I have had Andrew in my focus group in the Ubuntu Forums Beginners Team for a few months now, along with working with him for the duration on the UF Beginners Team, and Andrew is one of the most driven, and committed team members that I have had the great pleasure of working with. I enjoy all of our interactions and feel that I come out of them knowing more then when I started. He does an incredible job working on the IRC Administration and is nothing but fair and objective. Please consider his application favorably.

--  <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~paultag | Paul Tagliamonte]]</nowiki>
